actions.message:
Scrims are starting in 10sec!!!
Make sure to join the countdown and have your content loaded!
Good Luck and HF!

Announcement by ${member}
actions.name: Set Embed Description
Check is Bot in Voice Channel

actions.message:
```
!solo/duo/squad -> Announce a upcoming game
!starting -> Announcing that scrims are starting in a sec
(do not forget to type !play in #matches after you used the command)
!poll -> Let the community decide which gamemode will come up next
(for this command you will have to add reactions: Solo - :one: Duo - :two: Squad: :four:)
!play -> The bot joins your voice channel and starts the CD!
(you need to join the countdown before you use this command!!!)
__The most important part__
!callsolos -> Automatically does the steps above for SOLO
!callduos -> Automatically does the steps above for DUO
!callsquads -> Automatically does the steps above for SQUAD
(make sure to join the __countdown__ before you do these commands 

Have fun hosting!
```

actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
```
MODHELP:
!ban @member -> bans a member for lifetime unless he gets unbanned
!softban @member -> member gets banned and unbanned in order to
delete his messages 
!warn @member -> warns a member + member gets muted for 10min
!goodnickn -> when a user uses an inappropiate nickname it will
be changed to "Bushlover"
!warn/warn1h/warn1d @member -> mutes member for either 10min/1hour!1day
!unmute @member -> unmutes member immediately
!report @member -> report member (write this command in #report-info)
!setAFK30/5 -> sets the AFK timeout to 30/5 min
DO NOT SPAM COMMANDS and also DO NOT TORTURE PEOPLE for no reason!
```
